reviewText:
If you like problem solving and 2D platformers, this game is probably for you. The puzzles in the game can be quite challenging but never frustrating. The music is repetitive but never anoying.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GUlcjXjGOng
Positives:
Challenging and fun puzzles
atmospheric music

Neagtives:
The UI looks horrible.
voteText: 6 of 6 people (100%) found this review helpful

reviewText: Walk The Light is a pretty good puzzle-platformer, which gives you some hard puzzles to solve. The gameplay is very short though and the overall feeling is that of a casual title and nothing more. Pretty expensive for 9,99€, but a decent buy if you get at least 25% discount. It's fun and a mind trainer and itțs worth playing it, at least once. The mechanics are original and new.
